title:
Producing Energy Eigenstates of the ${\rm H}_{2}$ Molecule by
  Classically Emulated Quantum Simulation
abstract:
We produce an energy eigenstate of the ${\rm H}_{2}$ molecule from a
superposition of energy eigenstates by classically emulated quantum simulation.
We use a Hamiltonian of the ${\rm H}_{2}$ molecule represented by Pauli
matrices and concatenated ancilla qubits. Starting from an adequate initial
state of physical qubits, we produce a corresponding energy eigenstate by
twirling operations, that are time evolutions by the Hamiltonian controlled by
the ancilla qubits.
